Name: Export-ScheduledTask
Synopsis: Exports a scheduled task as an XML string.

Name: Get-ClusteredScheduledTask
Synopsis: Gets clustered scheduled tasks for a failover cluster.

Name: Get-ScheduledTask
Synopsis: Gets the task definition object of a scheduled task that is registered on the local computer.

Name: Get-ScheduledTaskInfo
Synopsis: Gets run-time information for a scheduled task.

Name: New-ScheduledTaskPrincipal
Synopsis: Creates an object that contains a scheduled task principal.

Name: New-ScheduledTaskSettingsSet
Synopsis: Creates a new scheduled task settings object.

Name: New-ScheduledTaskTrigger
Synopsis: Creates a scheduled task trigger object.

Name: Register-ClusteredScheduledTask
Synopsis: Registers a scheduled task on a failover cluster.

Name: Register-ScheduledTask
Synopsis: Registers a scheduled task definition on a local computer.

Name: Set-ClusteredScheduledTask
Synopsis: Changes settings for a clustered scheduled task.

Name: Start-ScheduledTask
Synopsis: Starts one or more instances of a scheduled task.

Name: Stop-ScheduledTask
Synopsis: Stops all running instances of a task.

Name: Unregister-ClusteredScheduledTask
Synopsis: Removes a scheduled task from a failover cluster.
